aturday, November 24, 2007 6:01 PM

  >I was bored today and went out and bought one of these, i'm gonna post
=

  =

  >=
 pretty good. Let me know what you think of these files.
  >
  > Thanx Sum,=

  > -Steve H.
  >

  > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Sumra Dume" <du=
ck@...> wrote:
  >>
  >> Hi,
  >> Just Hacked a radio shack model 12-469
  =
>> Cut the Mute pin and presto a fm sweep cheap!
  >>
  >> Cost 24.95 and a=
bout ten minutes time.
  >> it's not perfect but it's not expensive.
  >>
